charts_meta.name: Consider Ingestion Rules OR Adapter Settings
Devices Seen by Endpoint Protection Adapters
Devices Seen by Config & Patch Adapters

config.text:
Instructions


This is a detailed dashboard that provides details of areas where data hygiene may be an issue, identifies data that needs to be cleaned up at source, or is worked around in Axonius.


Data Hygiene is key to ensure that your organization has the information you expect to enable you to ask accurate questions of that data

68a3dfa129b270ea42e21eec.name: Consider Ingestion Rules OR Adapter Settings

config.text:

Recommended Adapter Type Coverage

6384b743e55313df93e31503.name: Data Hygiene - Single Adapter Devices
6384b743e55313df93e31503.description: The following query shows devices that are seen by only one adapter.

67f6a232a1cbb9e3546ba49d.description: Server and Workstation devices, derived from a combination of all operating system queries.
67f6a232a1cbb9e3546ba49d.name: SCOPE_AA - All Servers and Workstations

query.filter: (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["FreeBSD","Linux","OS X","Windows","macOS"]) and (("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == ({"$exists":true,"$ne":""}))) and not ("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == "Junos OS") or ("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["Data ONTAP","IBM","NetApp ONTAP","Oracle","Solaris","VMWare"]) or ("specific_data.data.os.os_str" == regex("^(?!windows).*(?:emc|storage).*$", "i")) or ("specific_data.data.device_model_preferred" == regex("^(?:UCS[A-Z]|N[0-9]{2}-[A-Z][0-9]{4}).*$", "i")))
query.onlyExpressionsFilter: (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["FreeBSD","Linux","OS X","Windows","macOS"]) and (("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == ({"$exists":true,"$ne":""}))) and not ("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == "Junos OS") or ("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["Data ONTAP","IBM","NetApp ONTAP","Oracle","Solaris","VMWare"]) or ("specific_data.data.os.os_str" == regex("^(?!windows).*(?:emc|storage).*$", "i")) or ("specific_data.data.device_model_preferred" == regex("^(?:UCS[A-Z]|N[0-9]{2}-[A-Z][0-9]{4}).*$", "i")))
